001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriber;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberConfiguration;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberErrorLog;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
009import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
010import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
011import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
012
013import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
014import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
015import java.util.function.Predicate;
016
017public class PersistentSubscriberSubscriber
018        implements Subscriber<WithMetadata<ArrayNode>> {
019    private final PersistentSubscriberProcess persistentSubscriberProcess;
020    private final PersistentSubscriberConfiguration configuration;
021    private final PersistentSubscriber persistentSubscriber;
022    private final Predicate<WithMetadata<ArrayNode>> filter;
023    private final PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint persistentSubscriberCheckpoint;
024    private final PersistentSubscriberErrorLog persistentSubscriberErrorLog;
025    private final Logger logger;
026    private Subscription subscription;
027
028    long skipped = 0;
029
030    public PersistentSubscriberSubscriber(
031            PersistentSubscriberProcess persistentSubscriberProcess,
032            PersistentSubscriberConfiguration configuration,
033            PersistentSubscriber persistentSubscriber,
034            PersistentSubscriberCheckpoint persistentSubscriberCheckpoint,
035            PersistentSubscriberErrorLog persistentSubscriberErrorLog,
036            Logger logger) {
037
038        this.persistentSubscriberProcess = persistentSubscriberProcess;
039        this.configuration = configuration;
040        this.persistentSubscriber = persistentSubscriber;
041        this.filter = persistentSubscriber.getFilter();
042        this.persistentSubscriberCheckpoint = persistentSubscriberCheckpoint;
043        this.persistentSubscriberErrorLog = persistentSubscriberErrorLog;
044        this.logger = logger;
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
049        this.subscription = subscription;
050        logger.debug("onSubscribe");
051        subscription.request(1024);
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public void onNext(WithMetadata<ArrayNode> arrayNodeWithMetadata) {
056
057        try {
058            if (!filter.test(arrayNodeWithMetadata)) {
059                skipped++;
060                if (skipped == 256) {
061                    subscription.request(skipped);
062                    skipped = 0;
063                    long revision = arrayNodeWithMetadata.metadata().getLong("revision").orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("Metadata does not contain revision"));
064                    persistentSubscriberCheckpoint.setCheckpoint(revision);
065                }
066                return;
067            }
068
069            long revision = arrayNodeWithMetadata.metadata().getLong("revision").orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("Metadata does not contain revision"));
070
071            CompletableFuture<Void> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
072            persistentSubscriber.handle(arrayNodeWithMetadata, future);
073
074            try {
075                future.orTimeout(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS).join();
076
077                persistentSubscriberCheckpoint.setCheckpoint(revision);
078            } catch (Throwable t) {
079                persistentSubscriberErrorLog.handle(arrayNodeWithMetadata, t);
080            }
081            subscription.request(1 + skipped);
082            skipped = 0;
083        } catch (Throwable e) {
084            subscription.cancel();
085            logger.error("Persistent subscriber cancelled", e);
086        }
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public void onError(Throwable t) {
091        persistentSubscriberProcess.retry();
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public void onComplete() {
096        logger.info("onComplete");
097    }
098}
